content.rendered:
2022 British Open
Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including a five night hotel stay, a comprehensive British Open experience for selected days, event hospitality (optional), a full Scottish breakfast daily, plus more. You can further customize your package with tee times, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades and other add-ons.
PackagesHotelRoom TypePackages From
5 nights / 2 roundsHotel Indigo DundeeStandard Room$7,845
5 nights / 2 roundsHotel Indigo DundeeJunior SuiteSold Out
5 nights / 2 roundsStaybridge Suites DundeeStudio Suite$9,625
5 nights / 4 roundsCraigsanquhar House Hotel
& Country Estate		Sold Out
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates may be available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit is due at time of booking. The balance is due 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing is subject to change prior to booking.
